text: The twenty-year review of "RSS 2.0" is now officially underway, with the release of the "reallysimple" package. I know not many people are paying attention yet, but this is the beginning of a new stack of open source feed tools. By the time we get to Sept 18, a nice new barn should be raised, and RSS can begin its second twenty years with some of the broken windows fixed and a fresh coat of paint.
